DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate relationship insulin resistance body composition relation secterion expression adipocytokines . Obese subject undergo 6 month hypocaloric diet without medication , , end diet , plasma sample subcutaneous adipose tissue sample obtain subsequent analysis .
